attributes.action: call on the Highways Agency to begin the urgent improvements to the A12 at the Gapton Hall roundabout earlier than the proposed start date in 2009/10.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gapton Hall roundabout is a notorious problem in Great Yarmouth. Since 1994 there have been 76 personal injury accidents on the roundabout. In 2006 this figure hit its highest level for 8 years. The Highways Agency needs to address this issue urgently and begin improving the roundabout ahead of the proposed start date in 2009/10.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call on the Highways Agency to begin the urgent improvements to the A12 at the Gapton Hall roundabout earlier than the proposed start date in 2009/10."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17283


Prime Minister's Office
